rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with a small foyer and coat closet to welcome guests, oriented in the east to catch morning sunlight.
An open living room area that doubles as a social hub. Large windows on the south for ample natural light and cross ventilation; built-in seating areas with Bohemian decor elements.
Adjacent to the kitchen, with an east-facing glass wall to enhance morning light. Designed in a Bohemian style with eclectic furniture pieces.
Modern yet cozy kitchen with integrated island and open shelving for display of Bohemian decor. South or southeast exposure for optimal sunlight.
Private guest room on the ground floor to serve as a separate living space, located in the north-east corner for balance per Vastu principles.
A quiet study or home office with large windows towards the north-west for ample natural light. Equipped with built-in storage and flexible furniture layout.
Utility room for household items and maintenance equipment, placed in the less prominent south-west corner as per Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: A welcoming entrance door facing east to greet morning sunlight. Made of high quality wood with glass accents for natural lighting while maintaining privacy.
Secondary exit near the garden area leading directly to the backyard swimming pool.
Large windows on living room and dining areas for cross ventilation and ample natural light.
Balconies accessible from the living area, kitchen and study that provide outdoor spaces for relaxation with partial views of the pool area.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom on the north-west corner, featuring an en-suite bathroom and walk-in closet. Large windows to provide natural light and ventilation.
Child’s bedroom with a focus on playful Bohemian design elements, located in the south-east area for a balance of energies.
Second child’s room designed as an extension of their sibling's space, with natural lighting and ventilation through large windows.

openings.description: A central staircase connecting the ground floor to the first floor, ensuring fluid movement while incorporating design elements that harmonize with the Bohemian aesthetic.
Large windows in bedrooms for optimal ventilation and natural light.

rooms.description: Bohemian-themed penthouse suite featuring an open living area, a small kitchenette, and en-suite bathroom. Designed to be the ultimate retreat space.

openings.description: Direct access from the penthouse suite to the expansive rooftop terrace designed for relaxation and outdoor living.
Expansive windows offering panoramic views of the surroundings, ensuring abundant natural light and cross ventilation.
